--- title: colab_everything keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Python library to run streamlit, flask, fastapi, etc on google colab." description: "Python library to run streamlit, flask, fastapi, etc on google colab." nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install colab_everything

How to use

Note: Make sure you have Streamlit installed before running the below code.

You can use pip to install Streamlit

pip install streamlit
{% raw %} 
from colab_everything import ColabStreamlit
ColabStreamlit('hello') # streamlit app path

Streamlit app can be accessed on: https://27b3dd7d3f04.ngrok.io
{% endraw %}
